name: Onslaught
text: Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack: Move into the space it occupied, if able.

name: Bulwark
text:
You may retrieve a discarded card.
**This turn:** You and friendly units in radius cannot be moved, pushed, swapped or placed by enemy heroes.

name: Mad Dash
text:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.
(*If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack.*)

name: Brutal Jab
text: You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit or a token adjacent to you up to 1 space.

name: Shield
text:
**This round:** When any friendly minion in radius is defeated you may discard a silver card. If you do, the minion is not removed.
(*The enemy hero still gains the coins for defeating the minion.*)

name: Shield Bash
text: An enemy hero adjacent to you who has played an attack card this turn discards a card, if able.

name: Mighty Punch
text: You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit or a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Counterattack
text: An enemy hero adjacent to you who has played an attack card this turn discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Savage Kick
text: Move up to 2 spaces. Push an enemy unit or a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Throwing Axe
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- You may discard a card; if you do, target a unit in range.

name: Bullrush
text: Before the attack: Move 2 or 3 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.

name: Furious Charge
text: Before the attack: Move 2, 3, or 4 spaces in a straight line to a space adjacent to an enemy unit, then target that unit.

name: Throwing Spear
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- You may discard a card. If you have a card in the discard, target a unit in range.

name: War Drummer
text: A friendly hero in range gains 1 coin; if any hero was defeated this round, that friendly hero gains 3 coins instead.

name: Bolster
text: **This round:** When any friendly minion in radius is defeated you may discard a silver card. If you do, the minion is not removed.

name: Fortify
text: **This round:** When any friendly minion in radius is defeated you may discard a basic card. If you do, the minion is not removed.

name: Master Skald
text: A friendly hero in range gains 2 coins; if any hero was defeated this round, that friendly hero gains 4 coins instead.

name: Leap Forward
text: Target a hero adjacent to you. After the attack: Move into the space it occupied, if able.

name: One Man Army
text: During minion battle you count as a heavy minion; if you would be removed, lose the push instead.
